name: SolarDistances
0:
”Alexa, ask solar distances the closest planet from the sun”
”Alexa, ask solar distances the farthest planet from the sun”
”Alexa, ask solar distances what is the closest planet from earth”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: solar distances
des: This skill can talk talk about what is the closest/farthest planet in the solar system from the sun/the earth.
